name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Access Incident
description: This playbook outlines the steps necessary to mitigate an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to gain unauthorized access to a server.

parallel--d56e36dc-6e64-41f6-9c65-85e1f4.name: Execute Mitigation Steps
parallel--d56e36dc-6e64-41f6-9c65-85e1f4.description: Simultaneously execute multiple mitigation actions to resolve the incident.

action--5d5a1e75-25d6-4e3d-959d-3e290378.name: Kill malicious process
action--5d5a1e75-25d6-4e3d-959d-3e290378.description: Terminate any processes running the malicious script.

action--a005c15c-b635-4a1f-9627-9cf1db47.name: Block malicious IP addresses
action--a005c15c-b635-4a1f-9627-9cf1db47.description: Block all inbound connections from the suspected malicious IP address.

action--c09bcb82-47da-44c3-92ee-e8dd8dfc.name: Remove all dropped files
action--c09bcb82-47da-44c3-92ee-e8dd8dfc.description: Delete any files that were dropped during the incident.

while-condition--1446e000-cc35-4973-9b9b.name: Check for remaining dropped files
while-condition--1446e000-cc35-4973-9b9b.description: Repeat removal process until there are no dropped files left.

if-condition--018d97a2-34e5-41b3-bd80-1e.name: Conduct full system scan if malware detected

action--047d67b5-a3c0-40da-b2f3-68abcbfd.name: Conduct full system scan
action--047d67b5-a3c0-40da-b2f3-68abcbfd.description: Run a full system scan to detect any remaining malware.

action--c5c1e9d7-f9eb-4b57-8887-e53a068b.name: Update system and patches
action--c5c1e9d7-f9eb-4b57-8887-e53a068b.description: Ensure the system and patches are up to date to prevent future vulnerabilities.
